label: lem-euclidean-richness
name: Environmental richness with a kinetic regularizer

attributes_added.label: attr-environmental-richness
attributes_added.expression: For all $(x_0, v_0) \in \mathcal{Y}$ and radius $r > 0$, the variance of $R(x,v) = R_{\mathrm{pos}}(x) - \lambda_{\mathrm{vel}}\|v\|^2$ on the Sasaki ball $B((x_0,v_0), r)$ satisfies $\text{Var}(R) \ge \sigma_{\mathrm{rich}}^2(r) := \lambda_{\mathrm{vel}}^2 \delta^4 / 4 > 0$ where $\delta := \min\{r/\sqrt{\lambda_v}, V_{\mathrm{alg}}/2\}$.

attributes_added.label: attr-satisfies-axiom-environmental-richness
attributes_added.expression: The reward function $R(x,v) = R_{\mathrm{pos}}(x) - \lambda_{\mathrm{vel}}\|v\|^2$ with $\lambda_{\mathrm{vel}} > 0$ satisfies the Axiom of Environmental Richness ({prf:ref}`def-axiom-environmental-richness`).
